newsitem.title: USA: Equitable Q3 hurt by bad debt reserve, charge.
newsitem.headline: Equitable Q3 hurt by bad debt reserve, charge.

text.p: Equitable Resources Inc on Tuesday said that its third quarter 1996 results were hurt by a bad debt reserve of $1.6 million, related to the potential bankruptcy of a gas marketing customer.
Equitable also reported a $600,000 after-tax charge for purchased gas expense as part of the company's annual gas cost recovery rate case settlement with the Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission.
Earlier, the company reported third quarter 1996 results at a loss of $3.7 million or $.10 per share, compared to a net loss of $4.8 million or $.14 per share for the third quarter 1995.

The 1995 quarter included a non-recurring income of $6.5 million or $.19 per share stemming from the approval by the Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission of an accelerated collection for certain gas costs from prior years that would otherwise have been included in operating results through 1999.
